title: 1911년 Ledgerwood 사건
summary: 미국 Oklahoma, OK 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Ledgerwood. 판결일: 1911-03-21. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Oklahoma.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: George Ledgerwood v. State.
**판결일**: 1911-03-21
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Oklahoma
**관할**: Oklahoma, OK

**판사**: PER CURIAM.

## 변호인

Hamon & Ellis, for appellant., Fred S. Caldwell, for appellee.

## 인용

- 114 P. 1131
- 5 Okla. Crim. 683

## 판결문 요약

The case-made in this case was not filed in the county court of Comanche county and is therefore stricken from the record. Counsel for appellant urge no errors as disclosed by the transcript, and finding none depriving the appellant of a substantial right, the judgment of the court below is affirmed....

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
